Articles.Content: Hi to everybody! I have been playing since 0.18. I'm still a newbie at the game because I've never ventured farther than the mun. Anyways, hello!
Hi Monkey29399. I have landed everywhere, and still have stuff to learn.
Hi Monkey29399 ! i have been playing since 0.23 and i have landed on every body but not tylo and i don't know why Lol
I mostly make planes in KSP. I haven't made a successful spaceplane though. My spaceplanes always overheat at 20 km:rolleyes:
Planes are tricky. If you have a specific problem, you could ask about it in the Gameplay section.

Welcome aboard!

We're a friendly bunch so don't be afraid to ask questions.
I just took this screenshot of my mun flyby.

Hmm, that doesn't look like the mun to me.

Also, I think that you're launching the wrong way, you want to launch to the 90 degrees marker, not the 270.

But Welcome!

Hmm, that doesn't look like the mun to me.

Also, I think that you're launching the wrong way, you want to launch to the 90 degrees marker, not the 270.

But Welcome!

That was the launch of my mun flyby spacecraft. I did indeed launch in the wrong direction, but turns out I got a free return trajectory(I didn't have flight planning, so that was by chance). I launched it in a fuel-inefficient trajectory(you can see that my velocity vector is 45 degrees even though I'm at 50 km), so I had about 1.2 liquid fuel and oxidizer left in the spacecraft after the flyby:)

Planes are tricky. If you have a specific problem, you could ask about it in the Gameplay section.

What about VTOLs? I hear those are very easy if done right. And planes are not very tricky either, just make sure to have CoL behind CoM.
Welcome to the forums Monkey29399, enjoy your stay with people here!
